com.compendium.core.datamodel
Class NodeSummary

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.PCObject
      com.compendium.core.datamodel.IdObject
          com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeSummary
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIdObject, INodeSummary, IPCObject, ICoreConstants, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShortCutNodeSummary, View
public class NodeSummary
extends IdObject
implements INodeSummary, java.io.Serializable

The Node object represents a hyperlinkable node that has as its minimum properties a type, label and detailed description.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getNodeSummary

public static NodeSummary getNodeSummary(java.lang.String sNodeID)
Return a node summary object with the given id. If a node with the given id has already been created in this session, return that, else create a new one, and add it to the list.

Parameters:
String - sNodeID, the id of the node to return/create.
Returns:
NodeSummary, a node summary object with the given id.

getNodeSummary

public static NodeSummary getNodeSummary(java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                         int nType,
                                         java.lang.String sXNodeType,
                                         java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                                         int state,
                                         java.lang.String sAuthor,
                                         java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                                         java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                                         java.lang.String sLabel,
                                         java.lang.String sDetail)
Return a node summary object with the given id and details. If a node with the given id has already been created in this session, update its data and return that, else create a new one, and add it to the list.

Parameters:
String - sNodeID, the id of the NodeSummary.
int - nType, the type of this node.
String - sXNodeType, the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
String - sOriginalID, the original id of the node if it was imported.
String - sAuthor, the author of the node.
Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of this node.
Date - dModificationDate, the date the node was last modified.
String - sLabel, the label of this node.
String - sDetail, the first page of detail for this node.
Returns:
NodeSummary, a node summary object with the given id.

                                         java.lang.String sDetail,
                                         java.lang.String sLastModAuthor)
Return a node summary object with the given id and details. If a node with the given id has already been created in this session, update its data and return that, else create a new one, and add it to the list.

Parameters:
sNodeID - the id of the NodeSummary.
nType - the type of this node.
sXNodeType - the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
sOriginalID - the original id of the node if it was imported.
sAuthor - the author of the node.
dCreationDate - the creation date of this node.
dModificationDate - the date the node was last modified.
sLabel - the label of this node.
sDetail - the first page of detail for this node.
sLastModAuthor - the name of the author who last modified this node.
Returns:
NodeSummary, a node summary object with the given id.
